ai-ds2.4.2:159.1_0: What things are united with joyful interest?
ai-ds2.4.2:159.2_0: By the doing of sense desires: four ways of doing happiness, with unprofitable joy, with sense-sphere profitable happiness, with unskill in bliss and accompanied by the noble ones, and with happiness and bliss born in one who has attained the unsurpassed in this way,
ai-ds2.4.2:159.3_0: these things are united with joyful interest.
ai-ds2.4.2:160.1_0: What things are not united with joyful interest?
ai-ds2.4.2:160.2_0: Equanimity is fourfold; it is for the sake of profitable results; and for the result of sensual pleasures, mental objects, contentment, seclusion, unskill in bliss, and in the unskill in the noble ones, and with happiness. And what is skillful and results in the world with happiness?
ai-ds2.4.2:160.3_0: these things are not united with joyful interest.
ai-ds2.4.2:161.1_0: What things are united with pleasure?
ai-ds2.4.2:161.2_0: And sense-spheres the following four kinds of happiness included in the fine-material sphere, fourfold and fivefold reckoning. They are skilled in the three kinds of happiness, doing goodness, and unprofitable result in the enjoyment, and with good results, with skillful intention and in fine-material sphere.
ai-ds2.4.2:161.3_0: these things are united with pleasure.
ai-ds2.4.2:162.1_0: What things are not united with pleasure?
ai-ds2.4.2:162.2_0: By directly knowing the four kinds of sensual stimulation: the following absorption, the result of all kinds of unskillful things, the fine-material sphere, the fourth absorption, the third absorption, the fourth absorption, the third absorption, and the fourth absorption. And what is skillful and the result of happiness?
ai-ds2.4.2:162.3_0: these things are not united with pleasure.
ai-ds2.4.2:163.0_0: gets rid of resentment for the relics, and surpassing the equanimity of (proces).
ai-ds2.4.2:163.1_0: What things are united with equanimity?
ai-ds2.4.2:163.2_0: By directly knowing the four kinds of sensual stimulation: the following absorption, the result of all kinds of unskillful things, the fine-material sphere, the fourth absorption, the third absorption, the fourth absorption, the third absorption, and the fourth absorption.
ai-ds2.4.2:163.3_0: These are the things that are united with equanimity.
ai-ds2.4.2:164.1_0: What things are not united with equanimity?
ai-ds2.4.2:164.2_0: And sense-sphere, an unprofitable way of speaking from the four kinds of happiness, aiming from the unskillful and an investigation of the fine-material sphere, and with unskilled in bliss who has attained the result, and with happiness and bliss and accompanied by equanimity.
ai-ds2.4.2:164.3_0: these things are not united with equanimity.
ai-ds2.4.2:165.1_0: What things are the things that are liked?
ai-ds2.4.2:165.2_0: By the doings of sensual pleasures, good and wholesome things, with good results in all kinds of sensual stimulation,
ai-ds2.4.2:165.3_0: These are the things that are profitable.
ai-ds2.4.2:166.1_0: What things are not (connected with) the sensual realms?
ai-ds2.4.2:166.2_0: although the fine-material sphere is immaterial sphere,
ai-ds2.4.2:166.3_0: these things are not (connected with) the sensual realms.
ai-ds2.4.2:167.1_0: What things are the form worlds?
ai-ds2.4.2:167.2_0: Except for the jhāna and the result of form, and the result of skillful things and the result of good conduct.
ai-ds2.4.2:167.3_0: These are the things that are proficient in the form world.
ai-ds2.4.2:168.1_0: What things are not found in the form world?
ai-ds2.4.2:168.2_0: (They are) in sensual pleasures of the fine-material spheres.
ai-ds2.4.2:168.3_0: These are the things that are not (connected with) forms.
ai-ds2.4.2:169.1_0: What things are the formless realms?
ai-ds2.4.2:169.3_0: these things are the formless realms.
ai-ds2.4.2:170.1_0: What things are not (connected with) the formless realms?
ai-ds2.4.2:170.2_0: The wandering of the senses of proportionality.
ai-ds2.4.2:170.3_0: these things are not (connected with) the formless realms.
ai-ds2.4.2:171.1_0: What things have been looked for?
ai-ds2.4.2:171.2_0: But the results of three skillful qualities—when they have done good and reputation in the three Vedas.
ai-ds2.4.2:171.3_0: These are the things that are infatuated.
ai-ds2.4.2:172.2_0: Four paths to conclude. And there are four fruits of the ascetic life and the fruits of the ascetic life.
ai-ds2.4.2:172.3_0: These are the things that are inclusive.
ai-ds2.4.2:173.3_0: These are the things that lead out.
ai-ds2.4.2:174.2_0: Those qualities that are skillful in the three unskillful and the results of the four in terms of the three initiatives, the four kinds of extinguishment:
ai-ds2.4.2:174.3_0: These things lead to the continuation.
ai-ds2.4.2:175.2_0: Four worlds: when they have passed away, the Buddhas associated with their own hands and feet,
ai-ds2.4.2:176.1_0: What things do they not have a fixed destiny?
ai-ds2.4.2:176.2_0: they are the four in views of personality, doubt, conceit, or inclinations of views, doubt, conceit, arousing, and uncertainty regarding the teachings. And they have gone beyond doubt, discovering the three in the three realms of persons, and penetrated it.
ai-ds2.4.2:176.3_0: These are the things that do not have a fixed destiny.
ai-ds2.4.2:177.2_0: But the results of three skillful qualities—when they have done good and reputation in the three Vedas.
ai-ds2.4.2:177.3_0: These are the things that are supreme.
ai-ds2.4.2:178.2_0: Four paths to conclude. And there are four fruits of the ascetic life and the fruits of the ascetic life.
ai-ds2.4.2:179.3_0: These are the things that are refuge with refuge.
ai-ds2.4.2:180.2_0: In the four grounds, the result of skillful qualities . And what is incapable of creating physical, verbal, or mental deeds?
ai-ds2.4.2:180.3_0: These are the things that are without faults.
ai-ds2.4.2:180.5_0: The treatment of the Teaching is finished.
